meanings.definition: The scientific study of human movement.
meanings.sent1: Kinesiology helps us understand how our bodies move.
meanings.sent2: In kinesiology class, we learn about the science of human motion.
meanings.sent3: I find it fascinating how kinesiology explains why we walk the way we do.
meanings.sent4: Her expertise in kinesiology made her a master at analyzing athletes' movements.
meanings.sent5: The kinesiology lab is filled with equipment to study how people walk and run.

meanings.definition: The study of the principles of mechanics and anatomy in relation to human movement.
meanings.sent1: Understanding kinesiology helps us see how muscles work together.
meanings.sent2: Kinesiology involves learning about how bones and muscles interact during physical activity.
meanings.sent3: The kinesiology textbook made me appreciate the complexity of our body mechanics.
meanings.sent4: His knowledge of kinesiology allowed him to design better exercise programs.
meanings.sent5: The kinesiology professor demonstrated how joints move during different exercises.
